items.title: Is Goldman Sachs Group (GS) the Best Stock to Buy According to Billionaire Chris Rokos?
items.description: We recently published a list of 10 Best Stocks to Buy According to Billionaire Chris Rokos. In this article, we are going to take a look at where The Goldman Sachs Group, Inc. (NYSE:GS) stands against other best stocks to buy according to billionaire Chris Rokos. Chris Rokos is a highly respected British hedge fund [â€¦]
